message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. Given its value, I believe a price of $22,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $18,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $20,000.  This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $19,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
